page.title: 15BACONSTHORPE FARMS.
page.content: AT{PITT FARM}THE FARMER GETS UP AT 7 AM. HE LIVES IN ASH TREE FARMHOUSE AND WORKS AT PITT FARM. HE DOES NOT HAVE ANIMALS ON THE FARM EXCEPT FOR 2 HIGHLAND CATTLE AND 7 COWS. 2 PEOPLE HELP HIM ON THE FARM. HE GROWS WHEAT, BARLEY,{SUGAR-BEET}AND PEAS. THE WHEAT IS FOR ANIMAL FEED, THE BARLEY FOR MALTING AND THE PEAS FOR FREEZING. AT CHESTNUT FARM THE FARMERS WIFE GETS UP AT 6.30 AM TO FEED THE{CHICKENS}AND HER CATS. THEY HAVE NO COWS AND NO SHEEP BUT THEY DO HAVE PONIES AND A DONKEY. THEY GROW BARLEY AND SUGAR- BEET. THE BARLEY IS MADE INTO{BEER}AND THE SUGAR-BEET IS MADE INTO SUGAR. THE FARMER'S WIFE DRIVES THE TRACTOR AND WORKS ON THE FARM TOO. AT BROOMHILL FARM THE FARMER GETS UP AT 7 AM. HIS ONLY ANIMALS ARE 2 PET CATS. HE GROWS OATS, BARLEY AND SUGAR-BEET. HE DOES NOT OWN A TRACTOR.
